page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: THERE IS VERY LITTLE HOUSING OF ANY GREAT AGE IN THE NORTHWICH AREA DUE TO THE SIDE EFFECTS FROM THE SALT INDUSTRY. THIS INDUSTRY HAS CAUSED SUBSIDENCE IN MANY AREAS AROUND THE TOWN DUE TO BRINE PUMPING OF THE SALT- ROCK BENEATH THE GROUND. THIS HAS NOW BEEN STOPPED ALTHOUGH A SUBSIDENCE BOARD HAS BEEN SET UP TO PAY COMPENSATION. THE HOUSING WHICH IS BUILT NOW IN AREAS SUBJECT TO SUBSIDENCE ARE BUILT ON GIRDERS.THESE CAN BE JACKED UP IF IT OCCURS. MANY AREAS ARE UNAFFECTED BY SUBSIDENCE AND OLDER AS WELL AS NEW HOUSING IS BUILT ON SOLID FOUNDATIONS. A RECENT NEW HOUSING DEVELOPMENT CAN BE SEEN AT THE PIPPINS IN WINNINGTON. THIS PROVIDES A MIXTURE OF FLATS,ONE, TWO,THREE AND FOUR BEDROOMED PROPERTY IN A VERY WELL LAID OUT AREA IN WHICH USE OF LEISURE FACILITIES IS INCLUDED.
